messages.label: error

statements.sql: SELECT (IFNULL(SUM(detallecuota.monto),0) + 750)as monto FROM cuotas,plandepago,venta,detallecuota WHERE cuotas.idPlandePago and detallecuota.idCuota and plandepago.idVenta=venta.id and plandepago.idVenta=5
SELECT SUM(cuotas.monto)as cuota from cuotas,plandepago,venta WHERE cuotas.idPlandePago and plandepago.idVenta=venta.id and  plandepago.idVenta=5
SELECT *from  cuotas,plandepago,venta WHERE cuotas.idPlandePago and plandepago.idVenta=venta.id and  plandepago.idVenta=5 LIMIT 1

params.hints:
Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table
LIMIT without ORDER BY causes non-deterministic results, depending on the query execution plan

statements.sql: SELECT COUNT(*)as contador FROM cuotas,plandepago,venta WHERE  plandepago.idVenta=venta.id and cuotas.estado='p' AND cuotas.idPlandePago and plandepago.idVenta=venta.id=5
SELECT cuotas.id FROM cuotas,plandepago,venta WHERE  plandepago.idVenta=venta.id and cuotas.idPlandePago and plandepago.idVenta=5 AND cuotas.estado='d' LIMIT 1

params.hints: LIMIT without ORDER BY causes non-deterministic results, depending on the query execution plan

statements.sql: SELECT IFNULL(SUM(detallecuota.monto),0)as monto FROM detallecuota WHERE detallecuota.idCuota=1
